name: Sargasso
summary: Sargasso is an 11-map space adventure episode for DooM II which requires a Boom-compatible port to play. You play as Wolf - the leader of a mercenary team which resides in a space station hideout known as Sargasso - until one day aliens capture a loaded cargo ship and wreak havoc on any who oppose. It's up to you now - grab your high-tech weaponry and show them who rules this side of the galaxy!
